 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Rob Gronkowski?
 Rob Gronkowski is 36 years old.
 When was Rob Gronkowski born?
 Rob Gronkowski was born on May 14, 1989.
 Where was Rob Gronkowski born?
 Rob Gronkowski was born in Amherst, NY.
 How tall is Rob Gronkowski?
 Rob Gronkowski is 6-6 (198 cm) tall.
 How much did Rob Gronkowski weigh when playing?
 Rob Gronkowski weighed 265 lbs (120 kg) when playing.
 Is Rob Gronkowski in the Hall of Fame?
 Rob Gronkowski has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.
 How many games did Rob Gronkowski play?
 Rob Gronkowski played 143 games over his career.
 How many receptions did Rob Gronkowski have?
 Rob Gronkowski had 621 receptions over his career.
 How many receiving yards did Rob Gronkowski have?
 Rob Gronkowski had 9,286 receiving yards over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Rob Gronkowski won?
 Rob Gronkowski has won 4 Super Bowls.
 When did Rob Gronkowski retire?
 Rob Gronkowski last played in 2021.
 What is Rob Gronkowski's Instagram account?
 Rob Gronkowski is on Instagram at gronk.
 What are Rob Gronkowski's nicknames?
 Gronk is a nickname for Rob Gronkowski.

 Frequently Asked Questions

 How old is Jimmy Graham?
 Jimmy Graham is 38 years old.
 When was Jimmy Graham born?
 Jimmy Graham was born on November 24, 1986.
 Where was Jimmy Graham born?
 Jimmy Graham was born in Goldsboro, NC.
 How tall is Jimmy Graham?
 Jimmy Graham is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.
 How much did Jimmy Graham weigh when playing?
 Jimmy Graham weighed 265 lbs (120 kg) when playing.
 Is Jimmy Graham in the Hall of Fame?
 Jimmy Graham has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.
 How many games did Jimmy Graham play?
 Jimmy Graham played 197 games over his career.
 How many receptions did Jimmy Graham have?
 Jimmy Graham had 719 receptions over his career.
 How many receiving yards did Jimmy Graham have?
 Jimmy Graham had 8,545 receiving yards over his career.
 How many Super Bowls has Jimmy Graham won?
 Jimmy Graham has never won a Super Bowl.
 When did Jimmy Graham retire?
 Jimmy Graham last played in 2023.

 Tony Gonzalez is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

 Tony Gonzalez was elected into the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2019.

 How old is Greg Olsen?
 Greg Olsen is 40 years old.

 Greg Olsen was born on March 11, 1985.

 Greg Olsen was born in Paterson, NJ.

 Greg Olsen is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

 Greg Olsen weighed 255 lbs (115 kg) when playing.

 Greg Olsen has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.

 Greg Olsen has never won a Super Bowl.

 Greg Olsen last played in 2020.
